text: haey a l laoh ban bangkeut puok anak ampi dei( ku a da) banteab mk pi tukkeam( mnoussa krobroub) kraoyomk trong ban bangkeut puok anak chea kou . haey kmean sdrei na del ppoh ning kmean sdrei na del br sautr botr krawpi sthet kraom kar doeng robsa trong laey . haey anak del mean ayouveng kmean anaknea ponyear ning katbanthoy ayou robsa ke ban laey leuklengte mean nowknong sievphow kamnttra( lav- ho l mah hvou sa) bonnaoh . pitabrakd nasa rueng noh ku ngeayosruol bamphot samreab a l laoh
